getBorderType().Description: Returns the type of border around the ad container.

getAnchorTextColor().Description: Returns the color of the ad URL.

getBackgroundGradientTop().Description: Returns the color of the background gradient at the top of the ad.

getCallButtonColor().Description: Returns the color of the call button when a call extension is shown.

getDescriptionTextColor().Description: Returns the color of the ad description.

getNetworkExtrasBundle(java.lang.Class<T.Description: Returns extra parameters to pass to a specific ad network adapter. Returns null if no network extras of the provided type were set.

getCustomChannels().Description: Returns the custom channels for the ad request. Custom channels allow publishers to track the performance of specific groups of ads. These custom channels need to created on the AdSense website. Reports can then be created based on the channels.

getBorderColor().Description: Returns the border color of the ad container.

isTestDevice(android.content.Context).Description: Returns true if this device will receive test ads.

getHeaderTextSize().Description: Returns the font size of the header text in pixels. The font sizes for the description and the anchor are determined from the header size.

getCustomEventExtrasBundle(java.lang.Cla.Description: Returns extra parameters to pass to a specific custom event adapter. Returns null if no custom event extras of the provided type were set.

getBackgroundGradientBottom().Description: Returns the color of the background gradient at the bottom of the ad.

getLocation().Description: Returns the user's location targeting information. Returns null if the location was not set.

getBackgroundColor().Description: Returns the background color of the ad.

getNetworkExtras(java.lang.Class<T>).Description: Returns extra parameters to pass to a specific ad network adapter. Ad network adapters provide a @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#NetworkExtras_E@ class. Returns null if no network extras of the provided type were set.

getQuery().Description: Returns the query of the search ad request.

getFontFace().Description: Returns the font used to render the ad. The same font is used in the header, the description and the anchor.

getBorderThickness().Description: Returns the thickness of the border in pixels around the ad container.

getHeaderTextColor().Description: Returns the font size of the header text in pixels.

ClassDesc: A @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest_E@ contains targeting information used to fetch an ad from Search Ads for Apps. Ad requests are created using @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#search#SearchAdRequest#Builder_E@.
